comments.body: Maybe we should put these lines in a shared place. If it's not too much trouble, and in a separate PR.

I looked around a little bit for this. It looks like `ScopedActivateExecutorContext` in either [cuda::ScopedActivateExecutorContext](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_activation.h#L34), or [rocm::ScopedActivateExecutorContext](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/stream_executor/rocm/rocm_activation.h#L34), are just alias to [gpu::ScopedActivateExecutorContext](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/stream_executor/gpu/gpu_activation.h#L38). Is it easier to just move the corresponding `using stream_executor::*::ScopedActivateExecutorContext` to either `rocm_activation.h` or `cuda_activation.h`?
